text:
A couple of things...

1- Today’s vote in the House was more political theater, not a solution to end the shutdown
2- We should be in D.C. tomorrow and every day until we reopen the government

Let’s do our jobs, stay in D.C., and end this shutdown!

html: I was just officially sworn in as #WI01’s representative. I'm ready to work with my House colleagues to address the issues impacting our community: lowering health care costs, increasing access to affordable education, and preparing today's workforce for tomorrow's jobs.pic.twitter.com/EqxHZ2k4R9
